caption.p: Bioclimatic variables of records of Lutzomyia intermedia ( red dots) and Lutzomyia neivai ( blue dots). a Annual mean temperature (°C) by annual precipitation. b Precipitation seasonality (coefficient of variation) by diurnal temperature range (°C). c Temperature seasonality (standard deviation) by diurnal temperature range (°C). d Precipitation seasonality (coefficient of variation) by temperature seasonality (standard deviation)
